pkgmetadata.longdescription: ePSXe is a Playstation emulator for Linux.

use.flag: Install the binary plugin when available
Install Pete's XGL2 PSX GPU plugin
Install Pete's Soft X GPU plugin
Install a version of Pete's ALSA SPU plugin that is patched to output to the pulseaudio device
Install desktop menu item (requires downloading Windows version to extract icon)
Install Pete's OSS (Open Sound System) Audio SPU plugin
